name: Eva (itch) (Amruth Varshan)
description:
Play as Eva, a renegade astronaut miner, and fly through interstellar space as you try to outrun a supernova.

An endless space shooter where you have to switch between controlling Eva, and her spacecraft, as you race through the void collecting resources left behind by asteroids in an effort to survive.

See how long you can withstand the abyss!

Some art and sounds sourced online.
